trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for elements that apply effects onto or around a single child element, such as <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供在单个子元素（如 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" />）上或周围应用效果的元素的基类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> contains a single <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, which is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>包含单个<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，其中指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> affects, or decorates, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>影响，或将修饰， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> may or may not have an appearance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>可能或可能没有外观的外观。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> puts a rectangle around a control, but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> has no visual presence.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>将一个控件周围的矩形但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>具有不会显示出来。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>。

trans-unit.source: **Note** The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `<Border.Child>` tags around the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>, but it is not necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> applies the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]示例版本可以使用`<Border.Child>`标记的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>，但不需要由于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>适用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。

trans-unit.source: ![TextBox with black border](~/add/media/layout-border-around-textbox.png "TextBox with black border")
trans-unit.target: ![具有黑色边框的 TextBox](~/add/media/layout-border-around-textbox.png "具有黑色边框的 TextBox")

trans-unit.source: Border around a TextBox
trans-unit.target: 文本框边框

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> this element uses to arrange its child content.
trans-unit.target: 此元素用来排列其子内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the arranged size of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> element and its child.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 元素及其子元素的排列大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the single child element of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 的单一子元素。

trans-unit.source: The single child element of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 的单一子元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> enforces a strong content model for child content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> must be a single <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>必须是单个<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: Index position of the child element.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element at the specified <paramref name="index" /> position.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定 <paramref name="index" /> 位置的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The child element at the specified <paramref name="index" /> position.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定 <paramref name="index" /> 位置的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> can equal only 0 or 1, specifying an `index` position greater than 1 or less than 0 results in an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>只能将 0 或 1，可以为指定`index`位置大于 1 或小于 0 导致<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于可见子元素的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can be used to iterate the logical child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可用于循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 的逻辑子元素的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate the logical child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 的逻辑子元素的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 不能超过的上限 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child element of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> to prepare for arranging it during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 的子元素，以便准备在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 处理过程中排列它。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的目标 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> determines its desired size by analyzing its child element's sizing properties, margin, and requested size.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>确定通过分析其子元素其所需的大小的大小调整属性、 边距和请求的大小。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要作为子级添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不可直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到该对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不可直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that is equal to the number of visual child elements of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值等于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator" /> 的此实例的可视子元素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 可视子元素数。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator> can have only one child object in its child collection, this property always reports 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator>可以在其子集合中有一个子对象，此属性始终报告 0 或 1。
